metadata.name: THE MAGICIAN
metadata.description:
An elite all-star warped into the ruby cell block of the crypto-court...

A former Rookie of the Year and euro-stud, "The Magician" is a dominant guard with size, that can be the floor general to lead you to success




ººººººººººººººººººººººººººººººººººººººººººººº

The initial 1st buyer of this NFT will receive:

*The digital NFT

*5x5 inch digital frame with "The Magician" pre-loaded 

*16x20 inch physical print of "The Magician"

*Limited edition holographic sticker of the Hyperballic Hoopers collection logo
